row.title: We bring convenience to your finger tips.
row.text: Buy anything from your favourite stores without leaving your location

row.title: Shop for a large variety of items
row.text: You can purchase food, Groceries and Daily needs, Raw food, Books, Dry Pet food, Wines, etc. without leaving your location

row.title: Buy easily from your favourite local stores.
row.text: Restaurants | Super Market (Groceries) | Finger Foods | Raw Food | Pharmacy | Book Shop | Drink Store | Pert Store, all in one place.

row.title: You'll receive your order within 30 mins
row.text: You can purchase your meals, Groceries and Daily needs, Raw food, Books, Dry Pet food, Wines, etc. without leaving your location.

row.title: Track of your order and get timely status update
row.text: Get update at each stage of your order from when you make payment down to delivery at your doorstep
